title: Genius Profiler Hansol Im - Novel Updates
tags: Anti-social Protagonist   Apathetic Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Child Abuse   Cold Protagonist   Crime   Criminals   Detectives   Doctors   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Police   Psychic Powers   Psychopaths   Serial Killers
author: 수박주스
description:
Hansol was diagnosed with anti-social personality disorder.

With the constant ‘education’ he gets from his father, a psychologist, he was molded to live an ordinary life.

Then one day, when he saw a killer trying to murder his mother, he could feel something change in him. 

“You are my kind.” 

“You… aren’t my kind.” 

Im Hansol, a psychopath profiler. 

Can he prove himself to be different by establishing himself as a genius profiler?>
